body_html: @annarev and @gargn It seems I was trying to solve the wrong problem. Yes, #ifdef something will help build on both RPI 3 and other platforms. But adding something like --copt=-DRASPBERRY_PI will be able to build pip package w/o problem. Will verify this on RPI 3, if that's true I'll close this PR later. Building TensorFlow natively on RPI 3 is painfully slow.

body: @annarev and @gargn It seems I was trying to solve the wrong problem. Yes, `#ifdef something` will help build on both RPI 3 and other platforms. But adding something like `--copt=-DRASPBERRY_PI` will be able to build pip package w/o problem. Will verify this on RPI 3, if that's true I'll close this PR later. Building TensorFlow natively on RPI 3 is painfully slow.
